title: Network calendar causes Thunderbird freeze
content:
Hello everyone, I have a problem with Thunderbirds calendar after installing the version 115.0.1 running on Windows 11. Syncing with my network calendar causes the program to freeze. I can wait a whole day and nothing happens. When I turn the calendar off, Thunderbird is working fine. Tried to delete the 'calendar-data/cache.sqlite' file, but it didn't helped. Deleted the calendar and add it as a new one - also no luck.

Thanks in advance for any help
creator: slawek.jsk

title: Thunderbird message filter "Run Now" button grayed out?
content:
I just downloaded Thunderbird for my Win PC. Win 10 Home, 64 bit. I have gmail downloading or linked to my PC. I then created some folders in Inbox then went up to the Tools menu, Message filters.

Did the Filter name - Manually Run - Getting New Mail

Match all of the following: From - Contains - Amazon.com

Move Message to - Amazon on XXXX@xxxx.com

Click OK

Back on Message filters window the "Run Now" is light gray? I can't press it and the Choose Folder only allows Trash or Outbox, no other box. Filters for: Local Folders

Not crazy about reinstalling as it took 2 days to download all the files from gmail. 

I did everything correctly (I think) so I'm not sure why it isn't working.  I restarted my computer and same thing.   Any help?  Bueller?
creator: bdiver

title: Thunderbird
content: When Thunderbird was auto updated from? to 115.0.1 my unified folders were significantly changed. I no longer have my main account shown in the unified folder, and do not have a my main account with other in the trash list, so cannot see deleted emails from my main account.
creator: sonomabridge
